resources.string: Your tutor has been notified of your request and should contact you shortly. After you have set up a time and place to meet, press below to continue.
You have a new tutoring request!
Call the number below to set up a meeting time and place. Once you meet up with your student, begin the session on both your and your students\' device.
Once you meet up with your tutor make sure you both press the begin session button below.
Are you sure you would like to cancel your request?

As a tutor it is your responsibility to contact your student at the number and set up an appropriate time and place to meet. Once you are both at the tutoring location, you must BOTH press the begin session button on your respective mobile devices. In order to get paid accurately for your services, before beginning the tutoring session make sure that BOTH you and your student press the begin session button.
After your tutoring session is over make sure BOTH you and your tutor press the end session button. You may be overcharged if you do not ensure that both you and your tutor end the session.
Are you sure you want to end this tutoring session?
